verses.verse: Again in the ninth <WH8671> year <WH8141>, in the tenth <WH6224> month <WH2320>, in the tenth <WH6218> day of the month <WH2320>, the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, write <WH3789> <WH8798> thee the name <WH8034> of the day <WH3117>, even of this same <WH6106> day <WH3117>: the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> set <WH5564> <WH8804> himself against Yerushalayim <WH3389> this same <WH6106> day <WH3117>.

And utter <WH4911> <WH8798> a parable <WH4912> unto the rebellious <WH4805> house <WH1004>, and say <WH559> <WH8804> unto them, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Set on <WH8239> <WH8798> a pot <WH5518>, set it on <WH8239> <WH8798>, and also pour <WH3332> <WH8798> water <WH4325> into it:

Gater <WH622> <WH8798> the pieces <WH5409> thereof into it, even every good <WH2896> piece <WH5409>, the thigh <WH3409>, and the shoulder <WH3802>; fill <WH4390> <WH8761> it with the choice <WH4005> bones <WH6106>.

Take <WH3947> <WH8800> the choice <WH4005> of the flock <WH6629>, and burn <WH1754> also the bones <WH6106> under it, and make it boil <WH7570> <WH8761> well <WH7571>, and let them seethe <WH1310> <WH8804> the bones <WH6106> of it therein <WH8432>.

Wherefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Woe <WH188> to the bloody <WH1818> city <WH5892>, to the pot <WH5518> whose scum <WH2457> is therein, and whose scum <WH2457> is not gone out <WH3318> <WH8804> of it! bring it out <WH3318> <WH8685> piece <WH5409> by piece <WH5409>; let no lot <WH1486> fall <WH5307> <WH8804> upon it.

For her blood <WH1818> is in the midst <WH8432> of her; she set <WH7760> <WH8804> it upon the top <WH6706> of a rock <WH5553>; she poured <WH8210> <WH8804> it not upon the ground <WH776>, to cover <WH3680> <WH8763> it with dust <WH6083>;

That it might cause fury <WH2534> to come up <WH5927> <WH8687> to take <WH5358> <WH8800> vengeance <WH5359>; I have set <WH5414> <WH8804> her blood <WH1818> upon the top <WH6706> of a rock <WH5553>, that it should not be covered <WH3680> <WH8736>.
Therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Woe <WH188> to the bloody <WH1818> city <WH5892> ! I will even make the pile <WH4071> for fire great <WH1431> <WH8686>.

Heap <WH7235> <WH8685> on wood <WH6086>, kindle <WH1814> <WH8687> the fire <WH784>, consume <WH8552> <WH8687> the flesh <WH1320>, and spice <WH7543> <WH8687> it well <WH4841>, and let the bones <WH6106> be burned <WH2787> <WH8735>.

Then set <WH5975> <WH8687> it empty <WH7386> upon the coals <WH1513> thereof, that the brass <WH5178> of it may be hot <WH3179> <WH8799>, and may burn <WH2787> <WH8804>, and that the filthiness <WH2932> of it may be molten <WH5413> <WH8738> in it <WH8432>, that the scum <WH2457> of it may be consumed <WH8552> <WH8799>.
She hath wearied <WH3811> <WH8689> herself with lies <WH8383>, and her great <WH7227> scum <WH2457> went not forth <WH3318> <WH8799> out of her: her scum <WH2457> shall be in the fire <WH784>.

In thy filthiness <WH2932> is lewdness <WH2154>: because I have purged <WH2891> <WH8765> thee, and thou wast not purged <WH2891> <WH8804>, thou shalt not be purged <WH2891> <WH8799> from thy filthiness <WH2932> any more, till I have caused my fury <WH2534> to rest <WH5117> <WH8687> upon thee.

I the YY <WH3068> have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> it: it shall come to pass <WH935> <WH8802>, and I will do <WH6213> <WH8804> it; I will not go back <WH6544> <WH8799>, neither will I spare <WH2347> <WH8799>, neither will I repent <WH5162> <WH8735>; according to thy ways <WH1870>, and according to thy doings <WH5949>, shall they judge <WH8199> <WH8804> thee, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.
Also the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, behold, I take away <WH3947> <WH8802> from thee the desire <WH4261> of thine eyes <WH5869> with a stroke <WH4046>: yet neither shalt thou mourn <WH5594> <WH8799> nor weep <WH1058> <WH8799>, neither shall thy tears <WH1832> run down <WH935> <WH8799>.

Forbear <WH1826> <WH8798> to cry <WH602> <WH8736>, make <WH6213> <WH8799> no mourning <WH60> for the dead <WH4191> <WH8801>, bind <WH2280> <WH8798> the tire of thine head <WH6287> upon thee, and put on <WH7760> <WH8799> thy shoes <WH5275> upon thy feet <WH7272>, and cover <WH5844> <WH8799> not thy lips <WH8222>, and eat <WH398> <WH8799> not the bread <WH3899> of men <WH582>.

So I spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto the people <WH5971> in the morning <WH1242>: and at even <WH6153> my wife <WH802> died <WH4191> <WH8799>; and I did <WH6213> <WH8799> in the morning <WH1242> as I was commanded <WH6680> <WH8795>.
And the people <WH5971> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Wilt thou not tell <WH5046> <WH8686> us what these things are to us, that thou doest <WH6213> <WH8802> so ?
Then I answered <WH559> <WH8799> them, The word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Speak <WH559> <WH8798> unto the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Behold, I will profane <WH2490> <WH8764> my sanctuary <WH4720>, the excellency <WH1347> of your strength <WH5797>, the desire <WH4261> of your eyes <WH5869>, and that which your soul <WH5315> pitieth <WH4263>; and your sons <WH1121> and your daughters <WH1323> whom ye have left <WH5800> <WH8804> shall fall <WH5307> <WH8799> by the sword <WH2719>.
And ye shall do <WH6213> <WH8804> as I have done <WH6213> <WH8804>: ye shall not cover <WH5844> <WH8799> your lips <WH8222>, nor eat <WH398> <WH8799> the bread <WH3899> of men <WH582>.

And your tires <WH6287> shall be upon your heads <WH7218>, and your shoes <WH5275> upon your feet <WH7272>: ye shall not mourn <WH5594> <WH8799> nor weep <WH1058> <WH8799>; but ye shall pine away <WH4743> <WH8738> for your iniquities <WH5771>, and mourn <WH5098> <WH8804> one <WH376> toward another <WH251>.

Thus Yechezk'el <WH3168> is unto you a sign <WH4159>: according to all that he hath done <WH6213> <WH8804> shall ye do <WH6213> <WH8799>: and when this cometh <WH935> <WH8800>, ye shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

Also, thou son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, shall it not be in the day <WH3117> when I take <WH3947> <WH8800> from them their strength <WH4581>, the joy <WH4885> of their glory <WH8597>, the desire <WH4261> of their eyes <WH5869>, and that whereupon they set <WH4853> their minds <WH5315>, their sons <WH1121> and their daughters <WH1323>,
That he that escapeth <WH6412> in that day <WH3117> shall come <WH935> <WH8799> unto thee, to cause thee to hear <WH2045> it with thine ears <WH241> ?

In that day <WH3117> shall thy mouth <WH6310> be opened <WH6605> <WH8735> to him which is escaped <WH6412>, and thou shalt speak <WH1696> <WH8762>, and be no more dumb <WH481> <WH8735>: and thou shalt be a sign <WH4159> unto them; and they shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>.
